Home Productions Team

Scripted productions is not only Hungary's youngest and most dynamically developing television program producing company, but also a creative workshop specializing in fictional television series production. The company’s founder, Barbara Hámori, a professional in domestic television, has founded her long awaited dream, her own film production company, after spending more than 20 years in program production.

Our current productions: The Godmother (Keresztanyu), Hotel Margaret, The Chef and the company (A Séf meg a többiek)

Our series under development: Wild wild East (Vadkelet), Come on down, good God (Gyere le Jóisten), Dreamy mountain (Álmoshegy), Miss Casanova, Conspiracy (Konteo), Just Love
